official_title: A Novel Decision Aid for Early Stage Breast Cancer Patients Choosing Between Lumpectomy and Mastectomy: a Pilot Study
inclusion_criteria:
* Adult women age 18-100
* English speaking
* Clinical stage 0-III breast cancer
* Eligible for both lumpectomy and mastectomy
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 100 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Prior surgical consultation regarding treatment options for breast cancer
* Previous history of breast cancer
* Requires neoadjuvant chemotherapy prior to surgical intervention
